findings.title: Reentrancy in getFirstWithdrawalBonus allows repeated bonus claims
findings.explanation: The function getFirstWithdrawalBonus credits rewardsForA and then calls withdrawReward (an external call) before setting claimedBonus. An attacker contract can re-enter getFirstWithdrawalBonus in its fallback, bypass the claimedBonus check, and claim the bonus multiple times.
findings.fix_suggestion: Follow the Checks-Effects-Interactions pattern: set claimedBonus[recipient] = true before calling withdrawReward. Alternatively, use a reentrancy guard or pull-over-push pattern, or make withdrawReward only callable by the recipient.
